Button.TooltipReference: Manually add a Pet Spell in the Pet RAW section and it will show up here. (I will make this work with drag and drop later)
Checking this hides the INI Path edit field.

Button.TooltipReference: Select the inifile for this character.

Screen.TooltipReference: Misc QoL tools, Work In Progress, TODO: Add stuff.

Button.TooltipReference: Memorize all spells in the MySpells section.
Save all current gem-spells to the MySpells section.
Open the server ini manager, where you can upload your ini to the cloud.
Open a window where you can see your group's windows (type /mule to populate, this is still a beta feature).
Outputs a list of any spells in this section that can be upgraded.
Outputs a list of any spells in this section that can be downgraded.
Pops up a menu which allows you to create commonly used hotbuttons for muleassist.
Opens Gem Manager which allows you to manage the MySpells section.

Editbox.TooltipReference: Internal Condition (can only be edited for the currently selected spell):
A MuleAssist Condition:

Button.TooltipReference: Turn Debug Buffs On/Off, This will output every step of the way of the Buffs code, so you can troubleshoot problematic spells that don't cast.
Left Click Activates This Box, Right Click Activates the full group

Combobox.TooltipReference: Box Mode : Tank, Assist, Puller, PullerTank, PetTank, PullerPetTank, Hunter, Manual
